section.p: This verb imports RSA keys of up to 4096 bits. However, the hardware configuration sets the limits on the modulus size of keys for digital signatures and key management; thus, the key can be successfully imported but fail when used if the limits are exceeded.
The importer_key_identifier parameter is a limited-authority key-encrypting key.
CRT form tokens with a private section ID of X'05' cannot be imported.

section.note: As of 5.4 and 6.2, this verb supports three-key TDES keys. As a key management service this includes three-key TDES key encrypting keys (KEKs).
